name: phonebook-app
description: Backend for Full Stack Open 2020 phonebook app

scripts.build:ui: Remove-Item -force -recurse build; cd ../full-stack-open-2020/part2/phonebook; npm run build; Copy-Item -recurse build ../../../full-stack-open-2020-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui; git add .; git commit -m 'uibuild'; npm run deploy

author: Oscar Jauregui
